name: Hiddenverse: Divided Kingdom
summary: Blood is being shed over the source of ancient magic. Find the murderers before the realm is torn apart. Hiddenverse - Divided Kingdom draws you into an escalating conflict between the Royal Council, mine owners, and wizards over the source of ancient magic. With the savior Lady Sarah poisoned, you must aid Tom - a young engineer - in his quest to discover the culprit before the realm is torn apart. Pick up the pieces in the steampunk Hidden Object game Hiddenverse - Divided Kingdom!
